snippet: Two former detainees, along with the family of a third detainee who died while in Central Intelligence Agency custody, alleged that they were tortured.
abstract: American Civil Liberties Union files suit in federal court on behalf of three former Central Intelligence Agency detainees--Suleiman Abdullah Salim, Mohamed Ahmed Ben Soud and Gul Rhaman--against James Mitchell and Bruce Jessen, psychologists who created interrogation techniques used in secret CIA prisons worldwide.
lead_paragraph: Two former detainees, along with the family of a third detainee who died while in Central Intelligence Agency custody, alleged that they were tortured.

headline.print_headline: The Americas; Psychologists Are Sued Over C.I.A. Techniques
headline.main: Psychologists Are Sued Over C.I.A. Techniques
